provider.name: Etisalat
provider.description:
Retrieve balance, status and renewal date from Etisalat (http://www.etisalat.ae) personal account on specified prepaid mobile number.

The personal account address is: https://www.e4me.ae/
provider.instruction: If you still have not got Etisalat personal account please fill in the following form: https://www.e4me.ae/e4me/etisalat/newregistration?SID=1
provider.author: Dmitry Kochin <dco@mail.ru>
